updates.start: function(doc, req) { log('req.id'); log(req.id); var dbs; if (! doc) doc = {}; doc._id = req.id; dbs = req.id.split(' => '); doc.source = dbs[0]; doc.target = dbs[1]; doc.continuous = true; doc.userCtx = req.userCtx; doc.$createdAt = doc.$updatedAt = JSON.stringify(new Date); for (var key in req.query) { doc[key] = req.query[key]; }; return [doc, "OK"] };
